projects.title: Car Loan Application for Individual User

Convert figma into a working angular template

Build mobile & desktop web based application UI Interface

projects.title: Car Loan Application for Corporate User

responsibilities: Daily Scrum with Team and client
Convert figma into a working angular template
Implement Changes based on product owner request
Weekly progress update to client
Help client deploy application to their private server

projects.title: Frontend System for Banking, Pension Saving System
projects.description: Application that handles banking transactions & data management such as hold amount, clearing, check stock, etc.
responsibilities: Write an angular application that handle bank transactions
Join weekly meeting between Frontend Developers for knowledge sharing
Join Agile Development activity such as refinement, sprint planning, daily stand up, sprint review & retrospective.
Working with backend developer to integrate Frontend and backend
Working with QA to ensure minimum bug delivery

projects.title: Frontend Data Matching for a private Bank
projects.description: an Application that show list of users data matching for banking purpose.
responsibilities: Work with backend developer to integrate data from matching service to user device
Update progress to user per sprint
Deploy to client staging server
Prepare docker image in *.tar for production
Providing guide to client IT to deploy app on their private production server
